comment.author: 38853398@N07
comment._content: haha cool, first bulletproof glass! where do you get all the invention pics from?

comment.author: 8252313@N05
comment._content:
@-3han-
All the photos and drawings are part of the collection of the Nationaal Archief, the national archives of the Netherlands, and Spaarnestad Photo. Many of them originally come from press agencies that have transferred their collections to us. The total collection contains over 13 million photos.
